title: XDM Business Account

xdm:ownerID.title: Account Owner
xdm:ownerID.description: assigned owner of account. Not available in personal edition.

xdm:parentID.title: Parent Account
xdm:parentID.description: Parent company for companies that are subsidiaries of a larger company or organization. The parent account must be an existing account in salesforce. You can enter the account name, or select (or optionally, create) the account using the lookup icon.

xdm:partnerAccountID.title: Partner Account Id
xdm:partnerAccountID.description: Partner accounts are accounts that a channel manager uses to manage partner organizations, partner users, and activities when using a partner community or partner portal.

xdm:territoryID.title: Territory Id
xdm:territoryID.description: The territory to which the account has been assigned.

xdm:accountSite.title: Account Site Details
xdm:accountSite.description: Information about the account’s location, such as single location, headquarters, or branch. Up to 80 characters are allowed in this field.

xdm:annualRevenue.title: Annual Revenue
xdm:annualRevenue.description: Estimated annual revenue of the account.

xdm:accountOrganization.title: Account Details
xdm:accountOrganization.description: Account details like number of employees, market segment, industry, and location.

xdm:naicsDescription.title: NAICS Description
xdm:naicsDescription.description: A brief description of an organization’s line of business, based on its NAICS code.

xdm:sicDescription.title: SIC Description
xdm:sicDescription.description: A brief description of an organization’s line of business, based on its SIC code.

xdm:accountName.title: Account Name
xdm:accountName.description: name of company. Up to 255 characters are allowed in this field.

xdm:ownership.title: Ownership
xdm:ownership.description: Ownership of company, for example, public or private. Entry is selected from a picklist of available values, which a salesforce admin sets. Each picklist value can have up to 40 characters.

xdm:isDeleted.title: Account Record Deleted Indicator
xdm:isDeleted.description: Indicator whether the Account record is deleted or not.

xdm:logoUrl.title: Logo URL
xdm:logoUrl.description: Path to be combined with the URL of a Salesforce instance (for example, https://yourInstance.salesforce.com/) to generate a URL to request the social network profile image associated with the account. Generated URL returns an HTTP redirect (code 302) to the social network profile image for the account.

xdm:tradeStyle.title: Account Trade Style
xdm:tradeStyle.description: A name, different from its legal name, that an organization may use for conducting business. Similar to (Doing business as) or (DBA).

xdm:tickerSymbol.title: Ticker Symbol
xdm:tickerSymbol.description: The stock market symbol for this account. Maximum of 20 characters.
